website_summaries.verdict: The Diddybeats earphones offer a great balance of style, durability, features, and sound quality, making them a good option for anyone looking for nice in-ear headphones with some character.
pros: The Diddybeats headphones offer a durable design with nice, stylish accents
and the package includes useful features such as in-line mic with volume and playback control for the iPod as well as a wide variety of eartips
cons: The Diddybeats' earpieces are on the large side and can have a tendency to push out of the ear

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look nice and have a good weight to them. I was a bit hesitant as others stated the weight resulted in them falling out easily. However, I haven't had this problem yet. I think they sound great as well. I also love the control talk. I haven't had any problems with it yet, but on an old pair of Tours, they did go out eventually, but hopefully that's not going to happen anytime soon with these. All in all, these look nice, feel nice, and sound nice.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Diddy Beats. 3.5 stars out of 5
customer_reviews.text: These head phones, sound amazing, and they are super comfy. Only negative is that the metal cable splitter is too heavy, so they pull the earphones out of your ear. The only reason i got these wore because they wore on sale. So i wont reccommend paying more than $80 for them. All in all great sounding earphones, as long as you dont mind having to constantlt push them back in after they have fallen out.
customer_reviews.author: KingBVI

customer_reviews.title: great performance
customer_reviews.text: Great performance & quality, all the different tips make them comfortable, they really reduce noise which is good to enjoy your music and so you don't have to hurt your ears with crazy high volume. The control talk is good, you just need to remember the different options like "click twice for shuffle" etc just to make better use of it, but the answer-hang up is easy. The flat cord is great cause it really is tangle-free.
customer_reviews.author: Stass

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are AMAZING! I love the colors they come in, and the size and sleek design of the earbuds are perfect. The little controls to raise & lower the volume and pause the music are so nifty! And let me not even get into their sound.....omg.....my music is NOT THE SAME with these headphones. It's crisp clarity, beautiful highs and lows, and the bass.....I'm in love lol....you can hear every detail! I can never put these down! I thought I was a musichead before but damn....now I'm bumping like 24/7! Thank you Monster for creating such an epic product.
customer_reviews.author: Coūrtney Chäntell ✨

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Crappiest in-ear headphones I have ever purchased. Way over priced! Definitely would NEVER recommend purchasing these. Neither the right or the left ear buds work after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Upset
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, I was amazed by its color, shape, and the delicate box. But, it's really NOT user-freindly. The earbud or the line is too heavy! It easily falls out of my ears! And although I tried all the earbud, but none of them work! It really makes my ears uncomfortable. It's not worth so much money!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several different pairs of earbuds (Klipsch, Panasonic, Ear Candy, Bose, etc.) and believe these are the best. Well made and the sound quality is fantastic. The effective block out external noise and allow me to enjoy music. I am glad I bought them and would highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Muschetto

customer_reviews.title: Not a good representation
customer_reviews.text: These are a cheap knock-off of the original. I used them for running and the are not very durable. I always had problems with the mic and taking calls with my iPhone, now none of the gages are working at all. I have had these for two months! The bass is not that great. I could have got the same results with some Rock Fish for half the price. Really sorry I brought these. Wish I could get a refund because I did not know they were that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I got these on Cyber Monday for a great deal at $100. After a couple days of anticipation it finally arrived. I had great expectation, and it met them. First of all, the quality is amazing: nice metal finish, ribbon wire, leather, extremely stylish (eye candy). Secondly, it had more than enough earbud tips to satisfy most everyone. And finally, the most important, sound quality. The sound quality on the "Diddybeats" are great: punchy bass as well as drums and you'll find yourself hearing background beats you never heard before. For the price I paid; well worth it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TheSkyboy

customer_reviews.title: Earbud went out
customer_reviews.text: Had these for just about a year and a half and the L side has gone out. This is the side with the microphone. I do not use these a lot so it's upsetting that I got so little use out of a $100 pair of head phones.
customer_reviews.author: DnD

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the big deal is with these In-Ear Headphones but the grandkids have to have Diddybeats. They all have them and now I see them on other people wherever I go. If it makes the grandkids happy, good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hect

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, but after 2 weeks one side ceased to work.
customer_reviews.author: Earlene Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love these beats
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earbuds I have ever owned. The bass is incredible ad the sound is clear. I like the weight and style as well. Overall i would recommend these. Specially at the $99 price point I paid
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product! if you looking for the best headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! if you looking for the best headphones on the market these are them. The life of these headphones will surpass any cheap headphones. Pay the extra money and get these. They are super comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: shannon paige

customer_reviews.title: No Diddy No Beats
customer_reviews.text: Well, just after 90 days my daughter informed me that the Diddybeats totally went dead. Prior to that she expressed issues with one of the ear-buds going out, and soon after receiving them there was an issue with sizing, where as if she was running the buds would fall out of her ear. She wanted to keep them, because they were stylish, and did sound nice, as long as she didn't run (which wasn't often). Overall, I am not pleased. and wouldn't recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Martin

customer_reviews.title: Monster Diddy Beats In Ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing!!! I am extremely happy with this purchase - they are high quality, the sound is phenomenal and they block out sound. Also, I love Amazon's customer service! There was an issue with the post office and even though my package was marked delivered I never received it. I called Amazon and no questions asked they overnighted a new package to me, free of charge - they said their ultimate goal was for customers to receive their items on time and this was a week past the estimated delivery date. You never have to worry when ordering through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: chicago2012

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: If I could have given ZERO STARS for this rating, I WOULD!!!! For headphones so expensive, there shouldnt be so many faults with it. I recently purchased this item, when I received it, the volume control doesn't function well. Does commands such as volume up or down, voice dialing, stop, track skips etc. without me even touching the dial. I contacted amazon about this, but I couldnt receive a refund, nor a replacement for this since my return policy expired. (or so they say.) I have never given a negative feedback on here... I am very dissatisfied! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Felix

customer_reviews.title: I made me so disappointed and I broke it when I get tired of ...
customer_reviews.text: So heavy and drop every time! I made me so disappointed and I broke it when I get tired of it!
customer_reviews.author: zinan

customer_reviews.title: loved 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my daughter because she insisted they were worth it.....she was right! They sound completely different than any other type of headphones I have bought for my kids before. Awesome sound and noise reduction! And- they are pink! She loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Z

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old loves hers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought her these for a Christmas gift! She loves them. I was so impressed with the price! I want to buy myself a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Right ear bud went out within 1 month and two weeks. For the money its worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to wear at work to block out office noise and to listen to tunes. Great product and love the options for fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used them one time, and I LOVE them. If anything changes, I'll edit my review at a later time, but so far, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Overcomer16

customer_reviews.title: Not so awesome after all....
customer_reviews.text: After destroying 3 pairs of these, I've learned my lesson and gone back to cheap earphones.... all the bells and whistles that are advertised mean nothing when the "tangle-free leather" breaks, the remote stops working, the earbuds themselves fall apart, and.....you have to jump through hoops to get them replaced, unless of course this happens the day after the warranty expires....I'm going back to the cheap ones....
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Teenager
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very happy and excited to receive her Diddybeats. They arrived on time for her to receive them for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Sexy Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drop
customer_reviews.text: I brought it one year ago but I have not use it once since that time. It is cute, but it is too heavy. I cannot find the method to keep it in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: kaiyue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with a minor fault
customer_reviews.text: These offer the best sound ever, they are like their older brother, the Beats by Dr Dre Studios but in the size of earphones. Great bass and clarity. One problem though is that they keep on becoming defective, after a few months, one earphone becomes faint and you can hardly hear the music. Factory fault? I don't know...
customer_reviews.author: bvovo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. A lot of rubber tips to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: Jettagirl

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I went off customer reviews and I'm so glad I did because these have exceptional sound and are sturdy- great earbuds to use working out!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great audio and value
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest beats headphones today are the urBeats for $100 They don't have tangle free cord or an L-jack Diddy Beats cost $150 when they came out like the Beats Tours Back then didn't have volume control The audio and bass is great 4 stars because the wire splitter is heavy, but just put the clip right under it
customer_reviews.author: Uriel817

customer_reviews.title: These in ears BANG!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few pairs of high end in ear buds and these are my favorite. People say they pull out of your ear but all you have to do is clip them to your shirt with the provided clip duh. I use them while commuting on the train and while I lift weights or am on the treadmill. I broke the plug by accident and was able to get them replaced by monster. I bought a pair of back up ibeats in the interim and they sucked compared to these. plug these suckers into a home stereo instead of your under powered ipod and see how good they really can sound! I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: patural9

customer_reviews.title: sounds good
customer_reviews.text: these sound good but they are a bit on the heavy side. it comes with many different attachments for the ear but the weight just too much
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift, haven't given them yet. But I have a set of pink one that rock for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meazel

customer_reviews.title: Same problem
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that two pairs of headphones had bad earpieces. Guess refurbished skipping the QA process. Wish someone had plugged them in to test before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: yourbabe

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: I love beats but sorry. You guys need to either fix your earphone quality and the way you make them or lower the price. They aren't worth the money just for them to break down every month. To all people wanting to buy these earbuds I suggest you buy Alec backbeat earphones. Those are the very he's in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Diddybeats for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas. He absolutely loves them. The sound quality is great. As a prime member, I received them via FREE two day shipping, which was wonderful. I recommend these headphones for anyone who loves music, has an IPhone, IPod, or etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kelandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: not worth 180$
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have these shipped out, but after about a month the left ear pieces wire started getting a little loose where it connects. Good sound but with rock or metal the bass doesn't sound so great, works well with rap, hip hop, and dance music.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: They look cute and the sound is great, but I couldn't get them to stay in my ears. Lucky for me my husband couldn't find his red ones one morning & took mine - & he lost them.
customer_reviews.author: MunaJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product is not curable and the membrane fell out bus the glue got dried.
customer_reviews.author: CandyShengtong

customer_reviews.title: Best out there for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The phones are great! I love the flat cable. Helps with tangles. Not ideal for sporting activity, but the sound quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: star barry

customer_reviews.title: Diddybeats
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about these in-ear headphones excpet the ContorlTalk feature. As other reviews point out it will not work or break with in a month.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: You are better off buying a pair of vmoda for quarter of the price
customer_reviews.text: The left side of the peice of junk stopped working after the 3rd use what more can i say?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones Out There
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Bose and SkullCandy and none even compare to these. I chose these over the Beats Studio (The over-head ones) and I know that I made the right choice. The sound quality is amazing and the styling is great. I would recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: DaveTBOW

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Awesome head phones. Way better than regular old ear buds. Music sounds wonderful in them. Would purchase them again anytime
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Diddlybeats in ear headphone
customer_reviews.text: I like this ear phones it's so light, but it always fall out of my ears, because I have small ears.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Lynn Aragosa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The headphone did not fit as expected and I found the difficult to jog with, the cords were too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Rosalina Harte

customer_reviews.title: Pink DiddyBeats
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed AT ALL. Seems to me like a pair of overpriced earbuds. The sound quality is like any other pair. I was expected it to sound superb being that it was a Beats By Dre product. Highly dissappointed!
customer_reviews.author: kbuckley19891

customer_reviews.title: This item sucks
customer_reviews.text: I only used it a few times and now it is broken. Only one side of the headphone has sound. Although it looks cute, the quality is so bad. Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Zhang

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. But sadly I broke it a couple of months after. I think I'd go with the headphones if I bought from Dr. Dre again ^^
customer_reviews.author: Bo-Ho Kim

customer_reviews.title: did not get what i paid for.
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the diddyeats headphone by dr. dre. the headphones are great but i did not get the accessory ear plugs that were advertized with the product i purchased. i made several attempts to make contact with no response.
customer_reviews.author: laurie gray

customer_reviews.title: good earbuds not great.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit too great in my ear and was not as nice as I thought for that kind of price.
customer_reviews.author: jamy haynen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRICE AND GREAD HEADPHONE. SO LOVELY. I like this so much. I buy three. one for me. two for my sisiters. They also like it.
customer_reviews.author: haha

customer_reviews.title: Great little stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a good set of earphones. They provide a good fit for a person with smaller ear cannels.
customer_reviews.author: PAN

customer_reviews.title: Rating
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a gift and I was happy to receive it before the recepient arrived to be able to give it to him. I haven't heard any complaints from him.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C Austin

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my diddybeats by Dr. Dre
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I wanted. I can hear the music very clear, and I love the way they are made. Just love them.
customer_reviews.author: tijgal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for my friend and she loves it! She said "Like the color, like the sound, like everything!"
customer_reviews.author: Lingxiao Zhai

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and my Mon loved it good price and good product. Glad I got these ones
customer_reviews.author: Tyrie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: I sent back this product because it was not as expected. The cost was way too high for what I received.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound and Bass
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I specifically bought these to work with my iPhone 4s. The controls worked beautifully. The Sound and Bass is very good. Cons: Heavy weight. Esay to get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: C Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter wanted this. I don't know much about this product, but she seens to love it. Not much more to say
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Julia

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: Earpiece string is to heavy. The weight pulls the ear bud out of your ear. The sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: veda clark

customer_reviews.title: Diddybeats
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. But Don't stay in ears. Even tried different sizes that came with. But they are heVy duty.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I don't like earphone, sometime I feel uncomfortable of my ear after use earphone. This one is comfortable and good quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Diddybeats by Dr. Dre Headphones
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what my son wanted. He is very satisfied with these headphones. He would recommend them to others. Plus I got free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Buy Only From Amazon Directly
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white version. Packing slip said shipped by Amazon but sold by another company. The box description was different than what was on the Monster website so I called Monster to verify whether the controls worked for iphones. After hearing my description of the box, they said that the item is at best a grey market product. As such, no warranty will be honored since the third party seller is not an authorized dealer. Monster recommended that I return it immediately. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: MKL

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them good price. They are so cool. Worth every cent of the money I paid for them. You should get a pair
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not good as i thought
customer_reviews.text: Kind of too heavy to keep it stay on my ear but the outlook are pretty cute that's the only thing i like this product so far
customer_reviews.author: Haoxin Lin

customer_reviews.title: already broken!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a Christmas gift and they broke in February!! One side has blown out and doesn't provide sound anymore. Very disappointed - waste of$100.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadine M. Meinen

customer_reviews.title: Deep bass
customer_reviews.text: At under $50 you can't beat the price no pun intended large assortment of different types of ear pieces was not expected snug fit helps deliver crisp bass and clean mids I was very impressed I also have a pair of beat studios and the sound is very comparable paying retail would be insane but if you can find them under $50 like I did go for it I also bought a pair of gaga beats for my girl and she loves them and they look as good as they sound
customer_reviews.author: Fonzietattoo

customer_reviews.title: I love my diddy beats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few years ago and they still work well. the sound is incredible. I just wish they came with tge piece to wear over the ears so they wouldn't fall out when I work out but I love them and keep them in my purse because you never know when you'll need them and they're Pink!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkee

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: THESE EAR BUDS HAVE THE SAME SOUND QUALITY AS A $15 WAL-MART BRAND. EVEN WORSE, THEY STOPPED WORKING WITHIN 90 DAYS.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I highly reccomend these headphones. Great sound, mediocre construction quality (but that's made up for by the amazing customer service from Monster).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: One of the best in ear I ever used . Very good sound . Comfortable in ear . A must have if you love great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Retlaw

customer_reviews.title: Upsetting!
customer_reviews.text: Paid a lot of money for these headphones just for the right side to stop working 4 months after the 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: SF415

customer_reviews.title: Broken & worthless!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter very disappointed Xmas day. Earphones not working on one side. Big bummer. Will stick with apple products. Beats way over rated.
customer_reviews.author: Slikpt

customer_reviews.title: Total scam
customer_reviews.text: package was opened and the headphones were an immitation (fake). And seemed refurbished
customer_reviews.author: LATINOS4

customer_reviews.title: Styling good headphones
customer_reviews.text: The color is great fire engine red! And the custom fit to your ear is great. I own a set of Bose headphones for my music system and let me tell you these are not too far behind.
customer_reviews.author: Xczar

customer_reviews.title: only one thing to complain
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is very very good, but it's just too heavy!! it keeps dropping from my ear, nothing helps... and to be honest, the other one $10 earphone I bought from Bed Bath & Beyond (which has no microphone) is way more comfortable than this one!!
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money on this!! They keep falling of the ear because of the heavy metal holding the cables, plus the left side bud stop working a week after
customer_reviews.author: Mzlakerz

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: I could not ask for a better product for my child. She likes to listen to her music and shows without outside noise. This was the perfect gift for the mucis lover in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new Diddybeats. The interface with my Iphone and Ipod is great and performs well. Great sound and fit. I love the flat wiring and the way that it hangs, but I do wish that it was slightly lighter in weight. Overall...great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: this product looks good, but the sound is really not match the brand.
customer_reviews.text: Good look, bad sound. My girlfriend like its fresh look, and I think it's pretty, but the sound is worse than my Apple earphone
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fabulous. They are very comfortable, cute, and sound amazing. The tangle-free cords and carrying case allow me to bring these everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in the OC

customer_reviews.title: Are they fake?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen white dre beats like these anywhere else & after I purchase them I find out that there's fake dre beats, so yea not sure
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: GREAT - Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my husband. He loves them. Great sound!!! Well made. No problems thus far. The seller was timely in mailing them. Would purchase other products from them!
customer_reviews.author: Gena M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are awesome. The bass is great, they look good, fit well, and ControlTalk is a must for my iPhone and iPad.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeFiend

product_meta.title: Diddybeats High Performance Cream In-ear Headphones with ControlTalk (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Color:Cream| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingDiddy Brings You The Ultimate High Fashion, High Performance Headphone From the man who celebrates the finest in luxury, culture, high fashion and, above all else, music, comes a headphone like no other: Diddybeats. Engineered to reproduce all the emotion stirring, crowd moving vibe hip-hop and R&B lovers crave, Diddybeats deliver on The Mogul's philosophy of performing at the highest level, and looking stunning at the same time. The leather-wrapped housing with high-polished enamel end cap is designed to compliment any high-fashion wardrobe. Diddy wouldn't have it any other way. ControlTalk: The Ultimate in iPod, iPadTM and iPhoneTM Control and iPhone/Music Phone Hands-Free Calling* With the built-in ControlTalk remote on Diddybeat's headphone cable, you get on-cable control of your music, as well as easy, high quality hands-free calling. You'll enjoy quick-access music playback control, like volume, play/pause and tracking, without having to dig for your iPad, iPhone or iPod. Plus, the high-grade mic and high-resolution, sound-isolating headphones all combine to let you hear and be heard much more clearly-and conveniently-than you ever could with your iPhone to your ear. No Tangles, More Time to Play Earbuds are convenient, taking the time to untangle them is not. Diddybeats features Monster's innovative headphone cable that not only sounds great, but is completely tangle-free. *Remote and mic supported by iPad, iPod Nano (4th/5th gen), Classic (120GB), Touch (2nd gen), iPhoneTM 3GS and newer, but not all Blackberry.TM Remote supported by iPod Shuffle (3rd gen). Requires software v. 1.0.3 for iPod Nano (4th gen), 2.0.1 for Classic (120GB), and 2.2 or later for Touch (2nd gen). Support for Blackberry varies by model. Subject to change. Find complete music phone compatibility: ControlTalk Compatibility for MP3 Players/iPhones.
feature_bullets: Patent Pending Tangle-Free Flat Cable Design
Monster ControlTalk for iPad, iPod and iPhone Music Playback and iPhone/music phone Hands-free Calling
